title: How to Upload Pictures from Android

steps.title: Open up your applications drawer.
steps.content: Open up your applications drawer. It's usually on the bottom left of the screen, and the icon looks like a grid of tiles.

steps.title: Navigate to “Gallery.
steps.content: Navigate to “Gallery. ” Its icon resembles a yellow lily.

steps.title: Choose the picture you would like sent to your computer.
steps.content: Choose the picture you would like sent to your computer.

steps.title: Tap the “<” symbol.
steps.content: Tap the “<” symbol. This is located at the center of the bar that contains the options which is located at the top of the screen.

steps.title: Select a Web Service.
steps.content: Select a Web Service. A menu will pop up featuring all the different Web services with which you can share the picture, such as Facebook, Twitter, etc.

steps.title: Upload.
steps.content: Upload. After selecting the service you wish to use, the correlating application will instruct you on how to proceed, as you'll be uploading your picture through their interface.

steps.title: Open up your applications drawer.
steps.content: Open up your applications drawer. It's usually at the bottom left of the screen, and the icon looks like a grid of tiles.

steps.title: Go to the website in which you would like to share your picture(s) on.
steps.content: Go to the website in which you would like to share your picture(s) on.

steps.title: Select pictures.
steps.content: Select pictures. Using the website’s preferred upload widget, select your pictures from your internal memory.
